sentences.en: If you can't limn the character, don't say it's the character.
sentences.cn: 如果你不能描写的特点，并没有说这是性格。

sentences.en: The effect of different doping elements on the electrochemical performance of spinel LiMn _ 2 O _ 4 was reviewed.
sentences.cn: 综述了不同掺杂元素对尖晶石型锂锰氧化物电化学性质的影响.

sentences.en: To limn their portraits, stately, beautiful, and emulate at will.
sentences.cn: 绘出他们描绘的图景，宏伟，美丽，随意地模仿。
